inclusion.criterion: HCV antibodies using a third generation test
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Liver biopsy in the past 18 months with METAVIR score over A2 and over or equal to F1
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients never treated with ribavirin, IFNalpha or PEG-IFNalpha
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prothrombin time over or equal to 60 percent
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Alpha-foeto-protein under or equal to 3 times the normal range for the laboratory
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Two negative Kato test (for S.mansoni) three days apart
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Co-infection with hepatitis B (positive HBs antigen)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a history of HCV and recent coinfection with HBV. He is on treatment for the past 6 months.
